newsitem.title: MONGOLIA: Mongolia foreign exchange reserves $60 mln end-Jun.
newsitem.headline: Mongolia foreign exchange reserves $60 mln end-Jun.

text.p: Mongolia's foreign exchange reserves rose to $60 million by the end of June, up from $53 million a year ago, the Bank of Mongolia said on Wednesday.
The total represented a rise of five percent compared to the beginning of this year, the central bank said without giving further details.
